parameters:
Would you like to view the event? Specialized breeding
experiment for seedbed species.

\nc<Saki>A cup ramen for 50 yen each, huh? I've heard that big
corporations have free hot water rooms, but I wonder what
they're like...
\bustMsgExp[1, 2]\nc<Saki>Is there really such a dreamlike place?

\nc<Saki>My living expenses are barely making it this month too. I
need to start saving soon...

\bustMsgExp[2, 1]\nc<Senpai>Well, that's fine but... wait. Can you show me the bottom of
that cup ramen?

\bustMsgExp[1, 4]\nc<Saki>Eh... What's this? Are you telling me there's a prize
inside?

\bustMsgExp[2, 0]\nc<Senpai>No. You've been selected for a business trip to a client!
And it's a research institution!

\bustMsgExp[1, 1]\nc<Saki>No way! Of all places, a research institution! You know what
they do there, don't you?

\bustMsgExp[2, 1]\nc<Senpai>But... is there any client that wouldn't be hard on you?
Aside from logistics companies.

\bustMsgExp[2, 0]\nc<Senpai>I'm counting on you, Saki. I'll cover your cup ramen cost in
exchange.
